author: YOUR_NAME_HERE
message:
fix: Add temperature sampling to eliminate deterministic cat posts

- Fixed tokenization to use temp files instead of string interpolation
  which was causing newlines to be escaped incorrectly
- Added temperature-based sampling with top-p filtering
- Default temperature=0.7, top_p=0.9 matches mlx-lm behavior
- Greedy decoding (temperature=0) deterministically produces cat posts
- Sampling produces varied output matching the training data distribution

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
